resources.string: Choose from stock recovery, a custom recovery of your liking, a custom recovery, or even a recovery/kernel hybrid! In order to reboot into your new recovery, you can either press the "Reboot Recovery" button below, or you can hold power+volume-up+home while booting."\n\n"Note:Hybrid kernel recoveries are for stock, TouchWiz roms only! They must also be booted through recovery. By flashing these hybrid kernel recoveries, you will lose access to your recovery menu until you re-flash a normal recovery.

"Welcome to EZ-Recovery 2.3! This app will allow you to easily flash recoveries and more on your Verizon Wireless Samsung Galaxy S3.


Note: You must be rooted to use this app!


Special thanks go out to the following - this app wouldn't have happened without them:

-Invisblek: Thanks for your amazing work. The community would be nowhere close to where it is today if we didn't have you, and also for the wonderful InvisiblekV2 kernel.
-dhacker29: Your work is awe-inspiring. Thanks for all your work with CM9/10 and for your modified CWM.
-AtLemacks: Thanks for the solid CWM Touch port.
